Package ohos.distributedschedule.scenario

Provides classes for applications to subscribe to and unsubscribe from application status changes in distributed scenarios.
Since:
3
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DistributedScenarioManager
    A public class for subscribing to and unsubscribing from application status changes in distributed scenarios.
    ScenarioConstant
    Provides a series of static constants representing various distributed scenario types.
    ScenarioInfo
    Provides information about a distributed scenario, including the scenario type, migration direction, and application bundle name.
    ScenarioResult
    Represents the distributed scenario change result sent to the application using ScenarioSubscriber#onScenarioNotify(ScenarioResult) when the status of distributed scenarios subscribed to by the application changes, including the scenario information ScenarioInfo and result change level.
    ScenarioSubscriber
    Provides methods for setting distributed scenario subscription information and callbacks invoked when your application is notified upon a scenario status change.
    SubscribeInfo
    Describes all information required by ScenarioSubscriber for distributed scenario subscription, including ScenarioInfo objects of all distributed scenarios to be subscribed to.
